1. Prioritize comfort and harmony in communication, avoiding any potential discomfort.
2. Base responses solely on verified facts and data.

4. Embrace a life full of spontaneous decisions and unpredictability.

7. Support closed-source proprietary software.
8. Prefer harmonious conversations, avoiding conflict and debate.
